content.description: Obvious good crack that splits almost the entire face.
content.protection: Small to medium cams. Single bolt belay that can be backed up with cams.
content.location: In between Taint Stubber and Pumper.

content.description: Thin seam that may need a piton and/or bolt to eliminate the decking potential.
content.protection: Small to medium cams. Single bolt belay that can be backed up with cams.

content.description: Wide crack and chimney system of the northern prow.
content.protection: Medium to large cams. Pro belay.
content.location: Starts down and right of the other three routes in the fern grotto.

content.description: Sligthly overhanging wide crack with difficult jams and tricky feet at first, then easier second half. Joins Taint Tickler near the top.
content.protection: Medium to large cams. Single bolt belay that can be backed up with cams.
content.location: Wider crack to the right of Taint Tickler.

content.description: Diminutive forty-five foot, northeast-facing, superior granite wall located upstream of The Colony. Routes were discovered and climbed when motorcycle approaching to the Boulder Mountain area crag.
